1:
--------------------
Text: Gaahl:  He is best known as the former frontman of Norwegian black metal band Gorgoroth.
Triplets:<Gaahl
2:
--------------------
Text: Gaahl:  He is also the founder and frontman of Trelldom and Gaahlskagg.
Triplets:<Gaahl
3:
--------------------
Text: Gaahl:  Since leaving Gorgoroth he has been involved with God Seed, Wardruna, and Gaahls Wyrd.

Triplets:<Gaahl
